Address.label: Address
Address.value: 355 ALHAMBRA CIRCLE,SUITE 801, CORAL GABLES, Florida, 33134, United States

CompanyDescription.label: Company Description
CompanyDescription.value: Catalyst Pharmaceuticals Inc is a biopharmaceutical company. It focuses on developing and commercializing innovative therapies for people with rare, debilitating, chronic neuromuscular and neurological diseases. It offers Firdapse, a proprietary form of amifampridine phosphate for the treatment of patients with Lambert-Eaton myasthenic syndrome.

value.name: Steven R. Miller
value.title: Chief Operating & Scientific Officer, Executive VP
